FuncDef: This command is used to redirect the FC of a packet of a pseudowire (PW) or network IP interface to an egress port queue group.

ParaDef.Info: This parameter must be specified when executing the port-redirect-group command. The specified queue-id must exist within the egress port queue group on each IP interface where the network QoS policy is applied. Values-1 to 8.
The specified policer-id must exist within the queue-group template applied to the ingress context of the forwarding plane. Values-1 to 8.
